mapper.select: SELECT SEQ_NO AS seqNo, CORP_CODE AS corpCode, GUBUN AS gubun, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME AS calleeReqDatetime, CHECKPOINT_SCORE1 AS checkpointScore1, CHECKPOINT_SCORE2 AS checkpointScore2, CHECKPOINT_SCORE3 AS checkpointScore3, CHECKPOINT_SCORE4 AS checkpointScore4, HAPPYCALL_AGENT AS happycallAgent, HAPPYCALL_DATETIME AS happycallDatetime, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_REQ_USER AS calleeReqUser, CUSTOMER AS customer, TEL_NO AS telNo, CONTENT AS content FROM ATMS_SLA_40

SELECT SEQ_NO AS seqNo, CORP_CODE AS corpCode, GUBUN AS gubun, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME AS calleeReqDatetime, CHECKPOINT_SCORE1 AS checkpointScore1, CHECKPOINT_SCORE2 AS checkpointScore2, CHECKPOINT_SCORE3 AS checkpointScore3, CHECKPOINT_SCORE4 AS checkpointScore4, HAPPYCALL_AGENT AS happycallAgent, HAPPYCALL_DATETIME AS happycallDatetime, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_REQ_USER AS calleeReqUser, CUSTOMER AS customer, TEL_NO AS telNo, CONTENT AS content FROM ATMS_SLA_40 WHERE SEQ_NO = #{seqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_SLA_40 SET CORP_CODE = #{corpCode}, GUBUN = #{gubun}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME = #{calleeReqDatetime}, CHECKPOINT_SCORE1 = #{checkpointScore1}, CHECKPOINT_SCORE2 = #{checkpointScore2}, CHECKPOINT_SCORE3 = #{checkpointScore3}, CHECKPOINT_SCORE4 = #{checkpointScore4}, HAPPYCALL_AGENT = #{happycallAgent}, HAPPYCALL_DATETIME = #{happycallDatetime}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, CALLEE_REQ_USER = #{calleeReqUser}, CUSTOMER = #{customer}, TEL_NO = #{telNo}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE SEQ_NO = #{seqNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_SLA_40 ( SEQ_NO, CORP_CODE, GUBUN, BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, CORNER_CODE, CORNER_NAME, TERMINAL_NO, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME, CHECKPOINT_SCORE1, CHECKPOINT_SCORE2, CHECKPOINT_SCORE3, CHECKPOINT_SCORE4, HAPPYCALL_AGENT, HAPPYCALL_DATETIME, ERROR_DATETIME, CALLEE_REQ_USER, CUSTOMER, TEL_NO, CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{seqNo}, #{corpCode}, #{gubun}, #{branchCode}, #{branchName}, #{cornerCode}, #{cornerName}, #{terminalNo}, #{calleeReqDatetime}, #{checkpointScore1}, #{checkpointScore2}, #{checkpointScore3}, #{checkpointScore4}, #{happycallAgent}, #{happycallDatetime}, #{errorDatetime}, #{calleeReqUser}, #{customer}, #{telNo}, #{content} )
